about_the_game:
In HeightMaster, players are invited to take on a fun and challenging tower-building journey. This casual game features simple controls: hold the mouse button to build each floor—the longer you hold, the larger the floor grows. However, the game’s core rule demands that each new floor must not exceed the size of the previous one, adding a layer of strategy and difficulty. To build as high as possible, players must release the mouse at the precise moment to ensure each floor is perfectly balanced.

As your tower grows taller, the margin for error narrows, putting your timing and judgment skills to the test. Press too briefly, and the floor may be too small to balance well; press for too long, and the oversized floor will break the rules, causing the tower to topple. Finding the right balance between timing and pressure is key to climbing the leaderboard.

In addition to the core tower-building challenge, there are many different architectural styles to choose from.
